name: Sand & Max
description:
In this game you need to repair your vehicle in order to get out of the desert before dying from dehydration!

How to play: 

Use left and right arrows or 'a' and 'd' to move on foot left or right. 

Press 'e' to pick up/drop objects, and click in the appropiate slots of your vehicle to plug them in. 

Remember: when you are lifting an object, you are getting dehydrated faster. 

Press Space bar to get in and our of your "vehicle".
